Index entries for sequences related to boustrophedon transform
formula: G.f.: E(0)*x/(1+x) + 1/(1+x), where E(k) = 1 - x^2*(k+1)*(k+2)/(x^2*(k+1)*(k+2) - 2*(x*k-1)*(x*(k+1)-1)/E(k+1) ); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Jan 16 2014
mathematica: t[n_, 0] := (-1)^n; t[n_, k_] := t[n, k] = t[n, k-1] + t[n-1, n-k]; a[n_] := t[n, n]; Array[a, 30, 0] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 12 2016 *)
program: a062162 = abs . sum . a247453_row -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 17 2014
